Name: Klondike
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel.
POUR all ingredients into chilled glass.
Review: A simple drink but its three-equal parts ingredients combine well.
History: Recipe adapted from A. S. Crockett's 1935 The Old Waldorf-Astoria Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Klondike contains 164 calories
